title: Unit and UI tests for Device Details feature
description: Unit tests: MACVendorLookupService, DeviceNameResolver, DeviceDetailViewModel. UI tests: DeviceDetailScreen object, navigation from NetworkMap, device info display, quick-action buttons. US-008 from Device Details PRD.
close_reason: Unit tests (19 tests, 5 suites) and UI tests all passing. DeviceDetailTests TEST SUCCEEDED.

title: Device Details View with device info display
description: New DeviceDetailView with organized sections: header (icon, name, status), network info (IP, MAC, manufacturer, hostname), status (latency, first/last seen, gateway), editable notes. Liquid Glass design, accessibility identifiers. US-004 from Device Details PRD.
close_reason: Implementation complete, build verified

title: Add unit test target and initial test coverage
description: No test target exists in project.yml. Need to: 1) Add NetmonitorTests target to XcodeGen project.yml 2) Create initial test files 3) Wire up scheme for test action 4) Add baseline tests for core services (NetworkMonitorService, PingService, DNSLookupService)
close_reason: Test target added to project.yml, 4 test suites with 8 tests all passing: PingServiceTests (3), WakeOnLANServiceTests (3), DNSLookupServiceTests (1), NetworkMonitorServiceTests (1)

title: Consolidate ResumeState implementations
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. Multiple services may have their own resume-safety patterns. Consolidate into the shared ConcurrencyHelpers.ResumeState actor.

title: UI Tests - Dashboard, network map, tools, settings navigation flows

Replace with meaningful assertions that verify clear button visibility after running the tool operation.

title: WidgetKit extension - Small/Medium/Large widgets for network status

title: Verify and fix TracerouteService TCP approach
description: P0 bug from v1.0 production plan. TracerouteService uses TCP-based approach due to iOS ICMP limitations. Verify it works correctly and produces reasonable hop results.
close_reason: Fixed fd leak on inet_pton failure and RTT calculation precision (seconds+attoseconds)

title: Traceroute only shows one hop - fix TCP probe logic

description: PRD Section 3.6 requires data export in JSON and CSV formats. Should export tool results, speed test history, and device data from SwiftData.

close_reason: All fixes applied and build verified: no-op assertions fixed in 4 files, legacy file removed, stop tests added for all tools, Bonjour/SpeedTest/Traceroute/PortScanner coverage expanded

title: Fix accessibility identifier element type mismatch in UI tests
description: 16 UI tests fail because accessibility identifiers on GlassCard/VStack/HStack containers don't map to otherElements in XCUITest. Screen objects need to use app.descendants(matching: .any) instead of app.otherElements for container elements.
close_reason: Already fixed - all screen objects now use app.descendants(matching: .any) for container elements and buttons for reliable detection

title: Expand Speed Test UI test coverage
description: Speed Test only has 6 tests. Add tests for: stop running test, results section content verification, gauge animation/activity during test, clear history if available.

title: Fix Dashboard title overlap with Session card
description:
The large 'Dashboard' navigation title overlaps with the Session card content. The 'Started' timestamp is visible behind the title text.

Root cause: Large navigation title with custom background and scrollable content.

Fix: Add proper top padding or use contentMargins to respect navigation title area.

Files: Netmonitor/Netmonitor/Views/Dashboard/DashboardView.swift
close_reason: Fixed: Added .padding(.top, 8) to VStack in DashboardView.swift. PR branch pushed.
